attributes.name: Class Card
attributes.readMe:
# Class Card

The Class card represents a specific class offering within Onyx Grove. It tracks key information about class sections including:

## Core Fields
- `classNumber`: Numeric identifier for the class
- `section`: Section identifier (e.g. A, B, etc)
- `type`: The type/category of class
- `leadTeacher`: Primary instructor for the class
- `additionalStaff`: Other staff members supporting the class
- `cohort`: The student cohort assigned to this class
- `students`: Computed field that automatically pulls students from the linked cohort

## Relationships
- Links to Staff cards for teachers/staff
- Links to StudentCohort for class roster management
- Computed relationship to Student cards via cohort

## Usage
This card is used to organize and track class offerings, their assigned staff, and enrolled students. The computed students field automatically stays in sync with cohort changes.

## Display
Uses the chalkboard icon to represent classes in the UI.
